get.description:
Returns scheduled backups(policies) that satisfy the provided filters and paginate them.
            
Throttling policy: not often than 1 request per 0.5 seconds.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Page number to get from the API. Default: 1.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Size of the page to get from the API. Default: 50. Max page size: 1000.

parameters.name: HistoryDays
parameters.description: Count of days to get backup history. Default: 0 days(without history). Maximum: 31 days.

parameters.name: excludeTags
parameters.description: Exclude the policies with the specific tags.

parameters.name: excludeDeviceTypes
parameters.description: Exclude the policies with the specific device types.

parameters.name: policyIds
parameters.description: Include only the policies with the listed Ids.

parameters.name: excludeBackupMethods
parameters.description: Exclude the policies with the specific backup methods.

text/plain.example: Quota exceeded. Maximum requests allowed: 1 per 5s. Please try again in 4 second(s).

application/json.example: Quota exceeded. Maximum requests allowed: 1 per 5s. Please try again in 4 second(s).

text/json.example: Quota exceeded. Maximum requests allowed: 1 per 5s. Please try again in 4 second(s).

get.summary: Get backups for BrightGauge with pagination.
get.description:
Returns scheduled backups(policies) that satisfy the provided filters and paginate them.
            
Throttling policy: not often than 1 request per 0.5 seconds.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Amount of days to fetch. Default: 1. Max Value: 31.

parameters.name: includeHistoryDetails
parameters.description: Include history details (result counts). Default: false.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Page number to get from the API. Default: 1.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Size of the page to get from the API. Default: 50. Max page size: 1000.

text/plain.example: Quota exceeded. Maximum requests allowed: 1 per 5s. Please try again in 4 second(s).

application/json.example: Quota exceeded. Maximum requests allowed: 1 per 5s. Please try again in 4 second(s).

text/json.example: Quota exceeded. Maximum requests allowed: 1 per 5s. Please try again in 4 second(s).

get.description:
Returns retired backups.
            
Throttling policy: not often than 1 request per 0.5 seconds.

parameters.description: Search by retired backup date start.

parameters.description: Search by retired backup date end.
